    • Constructor Detail

      • MockPi

        public MockPi(java.lang.String pName,
      java.lang.String server,
      int port,
      long waitingTime,
      Trackkeeper tracker)
       throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
              java.io.IOException
        Create a new MockPi and give it a name for testing/debugging reasons. It will connect to a ClusterMaster using an ObjectStream via server and port. On receiving a packet it will get the sequence number from the test XDPRequest, notify the tracker that the packet has arrived and wait the specified time.
        Parameters:
        pName - name of the Pi
        server - address to connect to
        port - port to connect to
        waitingTime - time a Pi is supposed to wait to simulate processing, in milliseconds
        tracker - Trackkeeper to notify that the packet arrived
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • teardown

        public void teardown()
              throws java.io.IOException
        End the threads to receive packets and send responses and close the streams
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
